title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 800.4 - Signs and advertisements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 800.4 - Signs and advertisements

State Regulations
(a) The
word ambulance may not be displayed on a vehicle, aircraft or boat except on a
vehicle, aircraft or boat registered with the department as an ambulance, except to comply with section
800.21
(e) of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
800.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
